title: Compare molecule properties of two ideal gases

content.question: Two samples of ideal gas in separate containers have the same number of molecules and the same temperature, but the molecular mass of gas X is greater than that of gas Y. Which of the following correctly compares the average speed of the molecules of the gases and the average force the gases exert on their respective containers?

choices.label: Average speed of Molecules Average Force on container Greater for gas X Greater for gas X
Average speed of Molecules Average Force on container Greater for gas X The forces cannot be compared without knowing the volumes of the gases
Average speed of Molecules Average Force on container Greater for gas Y Greater for gas Y
Average speed of Molecules Average Force on container Greater for gas Y The forces cannot be compared without knowing the volumes of the gases.

content.answer: Average speed of Molecules Average Force on container Greater for gas Y The forces cannot be compared without knowing the volumes of the gases.
